items.sentence: Three people were stabbed on Park Street last night.
Today, I watched a play written by a friend of mine.
Tom Jackson is one of the best detectives in Boston.
Tom accidentally cut himself while peeling an apple.

It\'s already ten o\'clock. My mother must be angry.
Tom demanded that we give him back his down payment.
Mary often has to take care of her younger siblings.
Mary was convinced that she would never get married.
Mary was definitely the prettiest girl at the party.
Mary worked as a babysitter when she was a teenager.
I\'d do it myself, but I\'m a little busy right now.
Tom died after stepping on a scorpion in the desert.
Tom died just one day after his seventieth birthday.
Tom does 100 sit-ups every morning before breakfast.
